code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProgressBar=_ref=>{let{progress,currentStep,totalSteps}=_ref;const steps=[{number:1,label:'Welcome',active:false},{number:2,label:'Property Info',active:currentStep>=2},{number:3,label:'Savings Calculator',active:currentStep>=3},{number:4,label:'Contact Info',active:currentStep>=4}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:'2rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-fill",style:{width:"".concat(progress,"%")}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center',marginTop:'1rem'},children:steps.slice(1).map((step,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center',flex:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:'2rem',height:'2rem',borderRadius:'50%',background:step.active?'linear-gradient(135deg, var(--gradient-start), var(--gradient-end))':'var(--border-gray)',color:step.active?'var(--primary-white)':'var(--text-gray)',display:'flex',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center',fontWeight:'600',fontSize:'0.875rem',marginBottom:'0.5rem',transition:'all 0.3s ease'},children:currentStep>step.number?'✓':step.number}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontSize:'0.75rem',color:step.active?'var(--primary-dark)':'var(--text-gray)',textAlign:'center',fontWeight:step.active?'600':'400'},children:step.label})]},step.number))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',marginTop:'1rem',color:'var(--text-gray)',fontSize:'0.875rem'},children:["Step ",currentStep-1," of ",totalSteps-1," \u2022 ",Math.round(progress),"% Complete"]})]})});};export default ProgressBar;
